titleStmt.title: The new world of English words, or, A general dictionary containing the interpretations of such hard words as are derived from other languages ... together with all those terms that relate to the arts and sciences ... : to which are added the significations of proper names, mythology, and poetical fictions, historical relations, geographical descriptions of most countries and cities of the world ... / collected and published by E.P.
titleStmt.author: Phillips, Edward, 1630-1696?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E. Tyler for Nath. Brooke ...,
